resources.string: A slum dweller, Kokki Kumar (Dhanush) returns from a movie to find his mother murdered by his own father.Prison exposes him to a whole new culture and a set of people who train him in a life of crime and violence, until Kumar becomes a consummate gangster. Delving further into the dark world, he murders many to become a powerful mob kingpin and joins hands with crooked politicians in his thirst for more power.
